column1: The  Defendant  remained  silent  by  not  posing  any  questions  on  the
trustworthiness of these two witnesses and it is additional proof of the fact in issue and
therefore the witnesses have to be believed.
Apart  from  the  evidence  that  transpired  at  the  purge~default inquiry, Journal  Entry

column2: No.42 of 11.12.1997 indicates that it was the 1st date of trial. On this date the Plaintiff and

column1: their Attorney~at~ Law had been absent and the Court dismissed the plaint.
